thread.title: Apple iPhone 7 and 7 Plus available with up to to Rs 10,000 discount on Amazon India
thread.title_full: Apple iPhone 7 and 7 Plus available with up to to Rs 10,000 discount on Amazon India

title: Apple iPhone 7 and 7 Plus available with up to to Rs 10,000 discount on Amazon India
text:
Apple iPhone 7 and 7 Plus available with up to to Rs... Apple iPhone 7 and 7 Plus available with up to to Rs 10,000 discount on Amazon India By - March 7, 2017 “The iPhone 7 and 7 Plus are available starting at Rs 49,999 and Rs 61,999 respectively” 
Earlier this month, Flipkart was offering attractive discounts and exchange offers on the iPhone 7 and iPhone 7 Plus ( review ). Now Amazon India is also offering the latest iPhones at discounted prices. The iPhone 7 and iPhone 7 Plus are available with up to Rs 10,001 discount on Amazon India. Amazon is running the discounted iPhone 7 sale till the end of March. 
The base 32GB models of the iPhone 7 and iPhone 7 Plus are now available on Amazon for Rs 49,999 and Rs 61,999 respectively, compared to the earlier price of Rs 60,000 and Rs 72,000 respectively. It’s worth mentioning that only the 32GB and 128GB models of the iPhone 7 duo are available with the discount on the e-tailer, as 256GB models are not part of the deal. Facebook Comments
